## Equations with $\LaTeX$

### Inline math

To familiarize with $\LaTeX$ basics apply to quarto check out: [https://biostats-r.github.io/biostats/quarto/](https://biostats-r.github.io/biostats/quarto/) > Figures, tables and equations > Equations
